entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:30 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 16 May 2016
